short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text and convert it to an iCal file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform selected text into calendar events with our Chrome extension, Text to iCal. Perfect for busy professionals, students, and anyone who wants to quickly add events to their calendar from web content.

Key Features:
- One-click conversion of highlighted text to iCal (.ics) files
- Automatic parsing of dates and times using advanced natural language processing
- Preview and edit event details in local time before downloading
- UTC time format for universal compatibility
- Clean, user-friendly interface

Ideal for:
- Scheduling appointments from emails or websites
- Adding webinar or online event details to your calendar
- Quickly capturing event information from social media posts

Current Limitations:
- All values highlighted are assumed to be in computer's local time. They are then converted to UTC for ics download, which may require manual adjustment for local time zones
- Complex or ambiguous date formats may not always be accurately parsed
- Multi-day events or recurring events are not yet supported
- Limited to English language date and time formats
- May not capture all event details from highly formatted or complex text layouts

Save time and reduce errors in your scheduling process with Text to iCal. Download now and streamline your calendar management!
